thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Jeff Sessions Weighs Firing of Former FBI Deputy Chief Andrew McCabe

author: Del Quentin Wilber
title: Jeff Sessions Weighs Firing of Former FBI Deputy Chief Andrew McCabe
text:
WASHINGTON—Attorney General Jeff Sessions is considering a recommendation to fire former Deputy FBI Director Andrew McCabe and could order his ouster this week, shortly before Mr. McCabe’s expected retirement, according to a person familiar with the matter.
Mr. McCabe allegedly wasn’t forthcoming with investigators probing the disclosure of information to a Wall Street Journal reporter for an October 2016 story about an inquiry into the Clinton Foundation, said the person.
...
